From: "Logo morph" <logomorph@...>

::DarkMouse::

*She barely opens her optics.  She can hear herself in the middle of a 
battle.  She knows she is too damaged to fight.  She will surrender and let 
her friends go.*

"Go and leave me.  I am not worth it. Save yourselves."

She winced in pain and moaned as the pain surged through her body. She tried 
to lift her gun but it was too heavy for her to lift in this weakened state. 
  She tried to transform but couldn't.  All she could do was lay there.  She 
hated not being able to fight.  She hated not being able to move.  What 
happened to her? She didn't even know how she got outside.  She saw 
Turantulas standing next to her.  She wanted to get back at him for what he 
had done to her.   She tried with all her strenght to lean a little closer 
to him.  She got within inches of one of his 8 legs.  She closed her optics 
and bit down as hard as she could on Turantulas's leg.  She sunk her teeth 
in as far as she could and held on.
